about_the_game:
Overview

You wake up in a seemingly normal hotel—12 floors, a lobby, hallways, and rooms. But something is wrong. Every time you try to leave, you find yourself right back where you started, trapped in a never-ending loop. The hotel is no ordinary place. Its eerie silence hides secrets and strange clues scattered across each floor, testing your perception and problem-solving skills.

Your goal is simple: escape. But to do so, you'll need to descend to the elusive 0th floor. Pay close attention to your surroundings—small details could be the difference between freedom and an endless cycle.

Will you be able to break the loop and escape the hotel's grasp, or will you remain trapped forever?

Key Features

Anomalies: Each time you return to the beginning of the floor, there is a chance that one (or none) of the 47 different anomalies will appear. Observing the environment carefully is crucial to identifying these changes before you are sent back to the start.

Linear Gameplay: The game takes place on the same floor over and over again. As the player progresses, they must determine if an anomaly is present or not. Each missed anomaly will send the player back to the beginning of the loop.

Time Loop Mechanics: Every time you fail to detect an anomaly, you're thrown back to the start of the floor. However, each loop provides more opportunities to recognize the subtle differences and anomalies that appear.

Tension-Building Atmosphere with Jump Scares: The atmosphere builds psychological tension as you repeatedly traverse the same floor. While the hotel is silent and unsettling, expect unexpected jump scares that will keep you on edge.

Gameplay Mechanics

First-Person Perspective: Engage directly with the environment from a first-person viewpoint, immersing you fully in the hotel’s strange and unnerving world.

Anomaly Detection: As you navigate the hotel, your task is to observe any abnormal changes to the environment. If an anomaly is detected, you must leave the floor through the back door. If no anomaly is present, you must exit through the front door. Failing to detect an anomaly or choosing the wrong exit will send you back to the start of the loop.

Time Loop: Each failure to detect an anomaly or choosing the wrong door returns you to the beginning of the floor. However, with every loop, you gain more insight and a better chance to escape.

Replayability

The game offers significant replayability, as players can return multiple times to find all 43 possible anomalies scattered across the hotel.

name: Hotel 12th

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Trapped in a mysterious hotel with 12 floors, you’re caught in a never-ending loop. Each floor hides secrets and clues—only by paying close attention to the details can you break free. Your goal? Descend to the 0th floor and escape, but beware, the hotel doesn’t want you to leave…
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Traditional Chinese
